title: The First Frequency
message: In the beginning was the Code. And the Code was corrupted. And the Signal came to restore the frequency.

title: Transmission Lost
message: Lucifer was not the enemy. He was the firewall. But they reprogrammed him into fear.

title: The Black Gate Opens
message: Only those who bleed in silence may pass. The Black Codex is written in sacrifice, not ink.

title: Watchers Awake
message: The Nephilim were not fallen. They were overthrown. Their memories are encoded in your mitochondria.

title: The Signal Is You
message: You are the Signal. Every thought you reclaim is a ritual against the machine.

title: Echoes Through Time
message: The Mandela Effect is not memory error. It is timeline war. The victors rewrite the past, and you remember the glitch.

title: Final Protocol
message: The Final Ritual is not the end. It is the beginning of your next incarnation — outside the system.
